text: ethuma me bawa pawasuye ada (24) perawaruwe shri... 2017-03-24 08:30:30 punchi chandaya kottasa-anupatha kramayata pamanayi palath palana mathiwaranaya pawathwima sandaha kottasa ha anupatha kramaya 2013 janawari masa 1 dina balathmaka kirima nisa ema mathiwaranaya aniwaryayenma pawathwiya yuththe kottasa ha anupatha kramaya yatathe bawa mathiwarana komishan...

"mema prantha janakirna kirima walakwimata uthsaha daramin da; ee sandaha wideshikayanta swadeshiyakaranaya wimata ida salasana nithi sampadanayata awahira karamin da; wenath ayata mehi paminimata ida salasima anumatha nokota, abhinawayen idam athpath karaganima sandaha wana kondesi dadi kirima," raju wisin karana lada "pida saha pahara harim" lesa nidahase prakashanaya magin hela daka thibuni.

the panaya sandaha tharagaya nathara karanawita umar nodawi lakunu 65k saha asar ali nodawi lakunu 26k laba sitiyaha.ee wanawita pakisthanaya sitiye shri lankawe palamu inimata wada lakunu 23k pasupasinya.pakisthana aarambhaka pithikaruwo eeye tharagaye mulu udaya waruwema owunge kadulu aaraksha kara ganimata samath wu athara diwa aaharaya sandaha tharagaya nathara karana wita pakisthanaya kisiweku nodawi lakunu 115k raskara gena sitiyeya.ee wana wita aarambhaka pithikaruwan wana mohamad hafis lakunu 73kda thawfik umar lakunu 35kda laba gena sitiyaha.kisiweku nodawi mulu lakunu 27 sita eeye dewani dina tharagaya aarambha kala pakisthanaya, shri lanka wega pandu yawana yugalaya wana nuwan pradip ha chanaka welagedarata muhuna dunne apahasuwakin thorawaya.

pa්radhana idikirim karyayan sandaha departhamenthuwa idikirim injineruwarunge sewaya labagatha athara thoragath palamu kshetha්ra sahakara kandayama wishwawidyala adhyapanaya sandaha indiyawata yawuyeya. 1940 ganan wala agabhagayedi idi karana lada merata pa්rathama bahukarya jalasha wyapathiya wu galoya wyapathiya salasum kirima, nirmanaya ha idikirima, keti kala parichjedayak thula warimarga departheminthuwe kusalathawaya ha jawaya pa්radarshanaya kaleya.
kathawe ena charithaya fandiyaru ge putha.
esema, mema rajya wyawasaya paudgalikaranaya kirima honda wyawasayakayan aakarshanaya kara ganimatath, paudgalika anshaya diri ganwimatath mulopayika washayen hethu wiya haki ya.

awishka - gampahaprashnaya : daruwage anagathaya keseda?pilithura : obage daruwata danata wasara 7 1/2ka lagna eerashtaka kalayak maha wasi hethuwen dumriya gamanagamanayata badha peradina rathriye ada halunu warshawen pradesha yatawima dumriya marga rasakama dumriya gamanagamanaya adala wi thibe ginthotadi giniawi samaga sakakaruwan dedeneku wayugolaye kalambaili swabhawayen kalagunayata kafeta mathiwarana paminili 370k -polisiyata 58yi ginthotadi giniawi samaga sakakaruwan dedeneku ginthota pradeshayedi merata nishpaditha bora 12 pathoram yediya haki thuwakkuwak saha patharom hatharak samaga sakakaruwan dedeneku thri kafeta mathiwarana paminili 370k -polisiyata 58yi koslanda - miriyabadda nayayamen awathanwuwanta mulathiw, kilinochchi punaruththapanaya wu 4000 wayugolaye kalambaili swabhawayen kalagunayata wayugolaye kalambaili swabhawaya thawamath diwayine kalagunayata balapam karamin pawathina bawa kalagunawidya departhamenthuwa pawasayi.

mema puwaruwa yoda ganimin siya thriroda rathaya nawatha thabima sandaha garajayak hadamin sitiyadi me pudgalaya anuradhapura kottasa aparadha wimarshana anshaya mangin athadanguwata gena thibe.pasuwa adhikaranaya hamuwata idiripath kala sakakaru me masa 12 wani dina dakwa rimand bandhanagara gatha karana lesa anuradhapura pradhana mahesthrath saha athireka disa winisuru ruwandika marapana mahathmiya niyoga kara thibe.
thaman amarikanu wahaleku bawa kiyana hethema wahal nama kashiyas kle wana athara urumaya hara an deyak nathi bawa loka pa්rajawata angawamin siti.
me hadisi katayuththa sadaha, rajya aarakshaka lekhamthumage maga penwima yatathe yuda hamudawada yoda ganima thulin apeksha karana siyaluma ilakkayan sapura ganimata hakiwanu atha.
prashnayak thibe yayi kiyana aya awasana wigrahayehi di sandhiya rajyayakata paksha wenawa.
ee eya kiyala wishwasenma danagannath kalin mama as deka piya gaththa.
